HTTP Endpoint¶

The tempodb.endpoint module provides functionality for accessing the HTTP endpoint for the TempoDB REST API. User code should not have to interact with this module directly.

class tempodb.endpoint.HTTPEndpoint(key, secret, base_url='https://api.tempo-db.com/v1/')[source]¶

Represents an HTTP endpoint for accessing a REST API. Provides utility methods for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests.

Parameters:
  • key (string) – the API key for the endpoint
  • secret (string) – the API secret for the endpoint
  • base_url (string) – the base URL for the endpoint
delete(url)[source]¶

Perform a DELETE request to the given resource with the given. The “url” argument will be joined to the base URL this object was initialized with.

Parameters:url (string) – the URL resource to hit
Return type:requests.Response object
get(url)[source]¶

Perform a GET request to the given resource with the given URL. The “url” argument will be joined to the base URL this object was initialized with.

Parameters:url (string) – the URL resource to hit
Return type:requests.Response object
post(url, body)[source]¶

Perform a POST request to the given resource with the given body. The “url” argument will be joined to the base URL this object was initialized with.

Parameters:
  • url (string) – the URL resource to hit
  • body (string) – the POST body for the request
Return type:

requests.Response object
put(url, body)[source]¶

Perform a PUT request to the given resource with the given body. The “url” argument will be joined to the base URL this object was initialized with.

Parameters:
  • url (string) – the URL resource to hit
  • body (string) – the PUT body for the request
Return type:

requests.Response object
tempodb.endpoint.make_url_args(params)[source]¶

Utility function for constructing a URL query string from a dictionary of parameters. The dictionary’s values can be of various types: lists, tuples, dictionaries, strings, or None.

Parameters:params (dict) – the key-value pairs to construct a query string from
Return type:string
